msg: The net accessor input source now can be used to get data using PUT or POST, as well as GET

msg: Performance: push a new map on the namespace stack only when an element has a xmlns attribute

author: amassari
msg: Content reported by a web site as text/xml is now read correctly; added an extra way of getting the size of the document in case no redirection has been performed

msg: Added error message for the HTTP NetAccessor
